pages.text: To progress further into Techguns you need to get to the nether, but the nether is a very dangerous place so you need to get the best weapons and armor available at the current tech level.

pages.title: Establish Base
pages.text: Before you got to the nether you should have established a base and setup ore processing systems and power generation from other mods. You need to mine obsidian to build a nether portal but obsidian is also need for the best pre-nether equipment.

pages.title: Armor and Weapons
pages.text: The recommended armor setup is a full 'Steam' or 'Ranger Veteran' armor set. A combat armor might be enough too, but don't fight in the nether with tier 1 armors. For weapons you want to craft an 'AKM' or 'Bolt Action Rifle'.
